Christians should not appeal to civil tribunals to settle differences that may arise among church members. Such differences should be settled among themselves, or by the 
                                                                           306
church, in harmony with Christ's instruction. Even though injustice may have been done, the follower of the meek and lowly Jesus will suffer himself "to be defrauded" rather than open before the world the sins of his brethren in the church.
